completions_model_provider_id.$comment: Language model global ID for completions.

api_keys.$comment: Dictionary of API keys, mapping key names to key values.

send_with_shift_enter.$comment: Whether to send a message via Shift-Enter instead of Enter.

fields.$comment: Dictionary of model-specific fields, mapping LM GIDs to sub-dictionaries of field key-value pairs.

embeddings_fields.$comment: Dictionary of model-specific fields, mapping LM GIDs to sub-dictionaries of field key-value pairs for embeddings.

completions_fields.$comment: Dictionary of model-specific fields, mapping LM GIDs to sub-dictionaries of field key-value pairs for completions.
